game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the depths of the temple
game.description: A powerful artifact has been stolen from our kingdom, and we have reason to believe it's hidden within the long-abandoned Temple of Eldarath. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the treacherous ruins and retrieve the lost treasure.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting +10% intelligence

task.objective: Navigate through the temple's entrance hall without triggering any traps
task.description: Avoid deadly darts and spiked floors as you make your way deeper into the temple. Keep an ear out for hidden mechanisms and watch for pressure plates.

task.objective: Solve the mirror puzzle to unlock the door to the inner sanctum
task.description: Use your wit to redirect beams of light onto pressure plates, avoiding laser-like beams. Be careful!

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the pedestal in the heart of the temple
task.description: Claim the prize and be cautious of the temple's dark magic as you take it from the pedestal.
